localization.messLoadDllError: Video module could not be loaded
localization.messKeyFileError: Please, check key file on the server
localization.messRecordBeforeSend: You must record the track before send it
localization.messModuleNotLoaded: Video module could not be loaded
localization.messScriptParamerterError: Wrong ServerScript parameter specified. ServerScript URL \nand Applet CodeBase should have the same Host. Upload is not \npossible. Please, change ServerScript parameter value.
localization.messFolderParameterError: Wrong VideoServerFolder parameter specified. VideoServerFolder \nURL and ServerScript URL should have the same Host. Upload is not \npossible. Please, change VideoServerFolder parameter value.
localization.messQTError:
Couldn't init QuickTime. Possibly QuickTime 
is not installed or old version is installed.
Playback is impossible, but you still can record
and upload your video.
localization.messVideoDeviceInit: Camera is not detected or used by other application.\nRecording is not possible.
localization.messAudioDeviceInit: Sound card is not detected.\nRecording is not possible.
localization.messMicNotDetected: Microphone is captured by other application\nRecording is not possible.
localization.messCamNotDetected: Web camera is captured by other application.\nRecording is not possible.
localization.messCamUnsupportedFormat: Applet does not support this video camera.
localization.messInternal: Internal unknown error\nRecording is not possible.
localization.messRewriteVideo: You are about to overwrite the video that you have recorded. Are you sure?
localization.messCheckName: Use for file name letters and digits
